categories.title: New Features
list: Initial release

categories.title: New Features
list: Added 1.15 and 1.16 template models

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the "minecart" template model

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Added missing "hat" bone to the "illusioner" template model

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the "pufferfish_small" template model

categories.title: New Features
list: Added new "player", "player_slim", "elytra", "trident", "shield", and "arrow" template models
Added new "melon_golem", "furnace_golem", and "tropical_slime" Minecraft Earth template models

categories.title: Changes
list: Modified the "banner" template model

categories.title: New Features
list: Added new Minecraft Earth template models

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the "wolf" template model

categories.title: Removed Features
list: Removed Minecraft Earth template models

categories.title: Changes
list: Added "strider", "zoglin", and "zombified_piglin" template models to the unsupported category

categories.title: Changes
list: Added a section showing what template models are currently compatible with 1.15

categories.title: New Features
list: Added a new "Legacy" section which now contains the 1.14 chest template models
Replaced the chest template models with the 1.15 versions

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the "villager" template model

categories.title: Changes
list: Complete revamp of all template models

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed "player" and "player_slim" template models

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the "villager" template model failing to load

categories.title: New Features
list: Added the "piglin", "piglin_brute", and "zombified_piglin" template models to the supported category

categories.title: Changes
list: Added unofficial "axolotl", "goat", and "warden" template models

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Minor bug fixes to various template models

categories.title: New Features
list: Added an unofficial "glow_squid" template model

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed issues with the "dolphin", "squid", "axolotl", and "warden" template models

categories.title: Changes
list: Added template textures to lots of template models
Improved the unofficial "goat" template model

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed issues with the "wither" and "parrot" template models

categories.title: Changes
list: Replaced the unofficial "axolotl", "goat", and "glow_squid" model templates with the official models

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed a typo in the "chest_large" model

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed issues with the "wither", "wither skull", and "rabbit" models

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Template models are now loaded from an external model JSON file

categories.title: New Features
list: Added the ability to reload the external external model JSON file
Added external model JSON version number

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Restructured the external model JSON file to reduce it's file size

categories.title: New Features
list: Added a brand new interface for selecting template models

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Rewritten most of the plugin

categories.title: Changes
list: Add plugin about details

categories.title: Changes
list: Support for Blockbench v4.0.0

categories.title: Changes
list: Updated unable to connect dialog

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed a bug with reloading template models

categories.title: New Features
list: Added info dialog that is shown when the plugin is first installed

categories.title: Changes
list: Added bug report button to the loader interface

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed "CEM Template Loader" not appeaing in the start screen

categories.title: New Features
list: Models can now be automatically loaded from URL queries in the webapp

categories.title: New Features
list: Added an OptiFine animation editor with support for editing and previewing animations from OptiFine CEM

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Only try to read OptiFine animations when the current format is an "OptiFine Entity"

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed switching project tabs breaking the OptiFine animation editor

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Only try to stop OptiFine animations when the current format is an "OptiFine Entity"

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed selection update event listener when no format is loaded

categories.title: Changes
list: Restructured the plugin's info dialog and renamed it to the about dialog

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Changed all references to the "Filter" menu to the new "Tools" menu

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed "CEM Template Loader" not appeaing in the start screen

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Small edits to the plugin's structure

categories.title: Changes
list: Replaced tutorials playlist link with a single tutorial video

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed playing animations when a non root group is selected

categories.title: New Features
list: Added seeded randomness support to the "random" OptiFine animation function
Added new OptiFine animation variables: "id", "rot_x/y", "player_pos_x/y/z", "player_rot_x/y", "death_time", "dimension", "frame_time"
Added new OptiFine animation functions: "printb", "lerp"
Added support for OptiFine animation "var." and "varb." entity variables

categories.title: Changes
list: The "print" function has been updated to match the officially supported one

categories.title: Removed Features
list: Removed internal support for the "idle_time" and "revenge_time" OptiFine animation variables
Removed "Invert this groups pivot point while playing animations" group option

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Switched to using the new ModelLoaders

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the "sqrt" OptiFine animation function when used with numbers that are zero or below
Fixed the "if" OptiFine animation function allowing non boolean inputs
Fixed OptiFine animations crashing if a cube is selected
Fixed having groups named the same as functions causing issues

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed a gap appearing between the OptiFine animation editor and the viewport

categories.title: New Features
list: Added "rule_index" OptiFine animation variable
Added ".visible" OptiFine animation property

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed issues with OptiFine animation validation
Fixed broken ".visible" references

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed "print" and "lerp" functions

categories.title: Changes
list: "rule_index" animation variable is now defaulted to "0"
"frame_time" is now affected by the animation timescale

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed issues with OptiFine animation validation

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Updated model source URL

categories.title: New Features
list: Added autocomplete support to the OptiFine animation editor

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed about action not being removed on unload

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed autocomplete for bones with numbers in the name

categories.title: New Features
list: Added JEM format restrictions

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed disable rotation toggles appearing on cubes
Fixed broken styles

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed tab key in OptiFine animation editor
Fixed OptiFine animation editor autocomplete

categories.title: Removed Features
list: Removed the ability to reload the template models

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Update to new plugin repository format

categories.title: New Features
list: Added a new dialog that shows when invalid operations are performed
Added an option to ignore unknown OptiFine animations
Loaded textures are now set as the default texture. This does not apply for models that load multiple textures

categories.title: Changes
list: "Load vanilla texture" will now be selected by default
Moved the pretty print button
The OptiFine animation editor will now always have a group selected
Changed the play animaions button's icon to be the regular play icon

categories.title: Removed Features
list: Removed "Load into current project"
Removed the ability to play only the current group's animations

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Rewritten most of the plugin
The CEM Animation Editor can now be extended by other plugins
The CEM Animation Documentation can now be extended by other plugins
Added CDN url fallback system

The external model JSON file's version number will now be separated from the plugin's version number. I have reset that version number to 2.0.0 and it will increase separately from the plugin's version number from now on
Added a class to the format page so it can be easily targetted by themes

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the page links in the CEM Animation Documentation

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed Vue.js warnings

categories.title: Changes
list: The CEM model search bar can now be cleared with a button
CEM animation errors now use the "error" colour instead of the "close" colour
CEM animation documentation scroll will now reset back to the top when changing tab

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed animation controller sliders going off the edge of the panel
Fixed project not getting entity name
Fixed codeblocks overflowing in the CEM Animation Documentation

categories.title: Changes
list: Invalid animations can now be saved instead of reverting to the last valid animation

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed loading models without a vanilla texture

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Loading a template model that is missing its vanilla texture will no longer trigger the connction error state

categories.title: New Features
list: Added support for the "ifb()" animation function
Added support for the "frame_counter" animation variable
Added more error checks to provide better animation error descriptions
Added support for "visible_boxes"

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: The animation editor will now no longer accept incorrectly formatted numbers
Fixed "render" variables throwing errors when used in animations
Fixed "part" and "this" variables throwing errors when used in animations
Fixed animations not being re-parsed when you add, remove, or rename a group

categories.title: New Features
list: Added support for entity list groups
Added support for entity list headings

categories.title: Changes
list: The root bone will no longer cause animation errors when not present in the model

categories.title: Changes
list: Support for Blockbench v4.12.0

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed opening the loader through the "File > New" menu, and when double clicking it on the start screen
Category subheadings will now be hidden when searching and nothing from that subcategory matches the search
